name: Call From The Ice
description:
Did a giant spider just kidnapped my wife?! Then it shall know my fury!

For our first time participating in the ACM Winter Game Jam, we present this prototype of a game idea, that could be continued depending of the acceptance. Thank you very much for the opportunity, and we hope you like our game.

(Because of a coding error, the retry button when dying isn't working. Sorry for the inconvenience, we'll fix it in the short time possible.)

Team: Joaquin Incio (Argos), Eduardo Ramón (Edurz) and Gonzalo Caballero (Oni)
